source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a static, high-angle shot of the tiled bottom of a pool or basin. The scene is viewed through murky, greenish water, which slightly distorts the grid of square tiles. A dark, splotchy stain is visible in the center of the frame.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.initial_feedback:
1. Since the camera zooms out, this is not a completely static shot. Clarify that among the elements in the frame, the only movement is the ripples of water at the top of the frame. 
2. The scene is not viewed through water. Rather, there is water present in the scene and the reflections off of it cast a greenish tint.
source_caption_data.gpt_feedback:
1. The description should note that the camera zooms out, so it is not entirely a static shot. Among the elements in the frame, the only movement is the ripples of water at the top.
2. The scene is not viewed through water; instead, water is present in the scene, and the reflections from it create a greenish tint.
source_caption_data.final_feedback:
1. The description should note that the camera zooms out, so it is not entirely a static shot. Among the elements in the frame, the only movement is the ripples of water at the top.
2. The scene is not viewed through water; instead, water is present in the scene, and the reflections from it create a greenish tint.
source_caption_data.gpt_caption: The camera begins with a high-angle shot of the tiled bottom of a pool or basin and gradually zooms out. The grid of square tiles is slightly distorted by the greenish tint created by reflections from the water, which is present in the scene. A dark, splotchy stain is visible in the center of the frame, while the only movement comes from the ripples of water at the top.
source_caption_data.final_caption: The camera begins with a high-angle shot of the tiled bottom of a pool or basin and gradually zooms out. The grid of square tiles is slightly distorted by the greenish tint created by reflections from the water, which is present in the scene. A dark, splotchy stain is visible in the center of the frame, while the only movement comes from the ripples of water at the top.

generated_critique: The caption incorrectly describes the shot as static and fails to mention the movement in the video. The description of the scene being viewed through water is inaccurate.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: A high-angle shot captures the tiled bottom of a pool or basin, with subtle movements creating a dynamic scene. The grid of square tiles is slightly distorted by the murky, greenish tint of the water. A dark, splotchy stain is prominently visible in the center of the frame.
